mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) AS noCnt FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp300t S WHERE CHECK_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , B.INSP_ID AS inspDetlId , B.INSP_NM AS inspDetlNm , A.CHECK_YN AS checkYn FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp300t A , ibjujundev.wit_insp100t B WHERE CHECK_YN = 'Y' AND B.INSP_ID = A.INSP_DETL_CD ORDER BY A.INSP_DETL_CD

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , A.INSP_NM AS inspNm , (SELECT COUNT(S1.INSP_ID) FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp100t S , ibjujundev.wit_insp100t S1 WHERE S.UPP_INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S.INSP_LEVEL = '2' AND S.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND S1.UPP_INSP_ID = S.INSP_ID AND S1.INSP_LEVEL = '3' AND S1.END_DATE = '99991231235959') AS inspDetlAllCnt , (SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND CHECK_YN = 'Y') AS inspDetlChoiceCnt , (SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND CHECK_YN = 'N') AS inspDetlNoCnt FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp100t A WHERE A.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND A.INSP_LEVEL = '1' ORDER BY A.INSP_SEQ

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , A.INSP_NM AS inspNm , A.UPP_INSP_ID AS uppInspId , (SELECT COUNT(S.INSP_ID) FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp100t S , ibjujundev.wit_insp300t S2 WHERE S.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND S.INSP_LEVEL = '3' AND S.UPP_INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S2.INSP_DETL_CD = S.INSP_ID AND S2.CHECK_YN = 'Y') AS checkCnt FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp100t A WHERE A.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND A.INSP_LEVEL = '2' AND A.UPP_INSP_ID = #{inspId} ORDER BY A.INSP_SEQ

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_SEQ AS inspSeq , A.INSP_NM AS inspNm , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_YN FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = #{parentsInspId} AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_ID), 'N') AS checkYn FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp100t A WHERE A.UPP_INSP_ID = #{inspId} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231235959' AND A.INSP_LEVEL = '3' ORDER BY A.INSP_SEQ

SELECT A.INSP_ID AS inspId , A.INSP_DETL_CD AS inspDetlId , A.INSP_DETL_NM AS inspDetlNm , IFNULL((SELECT CHECK_YN FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp300t S WHERE S.INSP_ID = A.INSP_ID AND S.INSP_DETL_CD = A.INSP_DETL_CD), 'N') AS checkYn FROM ibjujundev.wit_insp200t A WHERE A.INSP_ID = #{inspId} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231235959'
